message: An Attempt to achieve same rendering in all browsers ..
story: Ahmed Adel shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: O-Minds | CSX
caption: o-minds.com
description: CSX is a JQuery plugin that loads your CSS files and passes them through JQuery to achieve same rendering on all browsers. The plugin is extendable and allows users to write addons for the possibility of extending the CSS language.
